text:
@BarackObama @DrBenChavis The Democrats and the media-----attacked the Republican Governor of Georgia for ending shutdown

I supported him re-opening the state because I knew that it would help black owned businsses

Coronavirus cases in Georgia has DROPPED 12% since he reopened

https://t.co/5nkBNNJm6s
